prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with bright blue skin and large expressive eyes.
I want a small frog Pokemon that can leap high and swim fast in water.
Generate a playful Pokemon that enjoys splashing around in ponds and rivers.
Make a cute amphibious creature with webbed feet and a bubbly personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can camouflage itself in its wetland habitat while hunting.
Design a charming water-type Pokemon that loves to make friends with other creatures.
Show me a vibrant Pokemon that can use water-based moves in battles.
